scripts.build: yarn run build:client && yarn run build:server && babel-node buildSitemap && babel-node buildRss
scripts.build:client: yarn run clean:client && NODE_ENV=production yarn run webpack --config ./scripts/webpack.client-prod.js && yarn run copyfiles -f ./public/*.* ./assets
scripts.build:server: yarn run clean:server && NODE_ENV=production yarn run webpack --config ./scripts/webpack.server.js && yarn run copyfiles -f ./package.json ./build
scripts.watch:server: yarn run webpack --watch --config scripts/webpack.server.js & nodemon --exec NODE_ENV=development babel-node entry-server.js --config-file ./scripts/babel.config.js
scripts.analyze: yarn run clean:client && NODE_ENV=production yarn run webpack --config ./scripts/webpack.client-analyze.js
scripts.clean:client: yarn run rimraf ./build && yarn run rimraf ./assets/index.html
